name: ICP: The Gathering
description:
*New Release Sale for 24 hours*

*Note - The development team is working around the clock to update and improve the game. Send us your requests! Whoop Whoop!*

Juggalo's unite! The Official Insane Clown Posse Game is Here!
Do you have what it takes to be the #1 Juggalo and rise the leaderboards?
You're in charge of launching The Gathering, the biggest festival of the year!

Plan the Gathering and launch your own festival!
Nearly every aspect of the Gathering is at your fingertips.

Features:
- Your favorite artists Psychopathic Records Artists Sim'd out!

- The ultimate Gathering of the Juggalos simulation. Each festival attendee has their own personality and lifestyle. They eat when they're hungry, go to the bathroom when they nature calls, visit ATM's when they're out of cash, etc. etc. etc.

- Construct your stages and events

- Hire musicians and comedians

- Plan your timeline and decide when each artist performs

- Purchase land for your festival and even liability insurance

- Progress and expand your festival!

Our development team is working around the clock to update the game with new bands, features, and content.
